---
title: "rhino shiny apps"
subtitle: "Building a `rhino` shiny app with `box` modules: whole-game"
author: "Martin Frigaard"
date: "2023-07-01"
categories: [shiny, rhino]

This post is another walk-through of a shiny application using the  [`rhino` framework](https://appsilon.github.io/rhino/index.html). `rhino` is designed to, '*Build high quality, enterprise-grade Shiny apps at speed.'*--I'll go through developing a rhino shiny app (and how it's different from other app-packages).


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code  code-fold="false"}
install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("Appsilon/rhino")
```
:::


For consistency, I'll be using the application from the RStudio's [Building Web Applications with Shiny](https://rstudio-education.github.io/shiny-course/) course. These materials are a great resource if you're new to shiny--even if you're aren't, it's still worth checking out--plus it's free!

::: {.column-margin}
![](image.png){width=70%}
:::
